mapper.select: select i.ino, p.pno i.inprice, i.outprice, i.amount, i.remark, i.resdate from inventory i, product p where i.pno = p.pno order by i.resdate desc limit #{startRowNumber}, #{contentNumberPerPage}
mapper.insert: insert into inventory(pno, inprice, outprice, amount, remark) values (#{pno}, #{inprice}, #{outprice}, #{amount}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update inventory set inprice=#{inprice}, outprice=#{outprice}, amount=#{amount}, remark=#{remark} where ino=#{ino}
